website_summaries.verdict: Customers seeking a running belt that can double as an anti-theft fanny pack should check out this versatile product.
pros: Features both zippered pockets and flap pockets for easy access
4 compartments in total – 2 in front and 2 in back
cons: Some customers have trouble keeping the belt in place, as the moisture-wicking material makes for a slippery garment

customer_reviews.title: Discrete and roomy for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and discrete but roomy! Has four separated pockets, one with a zipper. Each pocket is deep enough to easily fit a passport, wallet, or phone. My iPhone 8 has room to spare. This is thin and snug enough to hide under clothes so I’m safe against pick pockets while traveling. I’m a size 0-2 and bought an extra small which fits snugly, but not tight. Keep in mind that this doesn’t have a zipper to secure it around your waist so it has to stretch over your shoulders or hips to get it on. If you have bigger hips and shoulders but a smaller waist you may want to size up.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for hot and humid weather.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a vacation through South East Asia to keep my passport and money safe. It rode up quite a bit, but kept everything safe. The issue was that it didn’t breathe AT ALL. Since it rode up, it just soaked up the sweat. It was still damp the next day still.
customer_reviews.author: Pepa

customer_reviews.title: Holds items well and has 4 compartments, 2 are zippered!
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily for my insulin pump. I like that it keeps it near the sensor and that it is deep enough to keep it inside and from rolling/falling out. It also has a couple zippered slots to really make sure things can be kept in place if necessary. I am short waisted and sometimes it seems a little tall on me but I like that it keeps things securely in place so I will deal with the height of it. (it covers my abdomen and tops at my belly button) Then my ribs are conveniently right there at the top also!! lol
customer_reviews.author: kat432

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for travel, use it for workouts
customer_reviews.text: I love this band, but mostly just for workouts! I bought it before traveling abroad, and I actually use it more to store my gym card, phone, protein bar, etc. while I work out. Its really helpful for those who wear yoga pants or shorts that don't have pockets, because it has six compartments that could fit everything you need. The fabric isn't that breathable, but I'm not bothered as much by it. I should have gotten a smaller size, but it fits me pretty well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received today-I don’t often take the time to do reviews, but I had to make the effort. This is exactly what I was looking for-it’s even better than I hoped it would be. My second job is 100% standing/walking for long hours, and anything I need has to be stuffed in my pants pockets. This has room for everything and is such a perfectly comfortable fit! It is made so well and the price is sweet!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for my portable CHEMO PUMP
customer_reviews.text: Great for my portable CHEMO pump. This is the best thing ever made. My chemo pump came with a fanny pack type of bag that I could were over my shoulder or along my waist which was a pain. This could not have been more perfect. I called the company to see if I could bring this to my chemo center and share and they then sent me 20 samples to give to them for patients!! Best company ever.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila W

customer_reviews.title: Hazard
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this again. The problem is that you cannot tell when your phone is secure. I have had several occasions when my phone has fallen to the ground because it wasn't secure. The belt is very elastic and lets the phone fall out regularly. There is a zippered pouch but it is too small for a phone - just keys. I have had to stop using it because the phone falls out almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! #1 it will not stay in place for nothing it is constantly rolling up your tummy regardless of where it is placed (low waist, high waist) #2 it does nothing to protect your phone or other items you place in the pockets from moisture (sweat). There is only 1 pocket that has a zipper which is hard to find and open forget running while trying to do that. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: GChurch

customer_reviews.title: POCKETS!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made travel belt. Great material...My main reason for this purchase was for walking my dog. Most of my pants do not have pockets and the "key pocket" in most leggings are useless...this is a great way to carry keys, cellphone, flashlight, (empty)poop bags. Snug enough to hang my fur babies treat bag. I feel organized , its comfortable and not bulky . For size help, I know I was concerned. I am plus size 5'3'' size 16w-18w and carry my weight in my booty and was worried the XL would slip or rollup. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Petsch

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Workmanship
customer_reviews.text: After much research, I purchased this Stashbandz and just unpacked it today. There is one vertical seam that has four layers of seams, all of the remaining seams (separating one section from another) are one layer and each is incomplete - hence, t here is only one large pocket, with entrances to other partial pockets from each section. "Made in America" certainly does not have the connotation with this product that it has with 99% of other "Made in America" products. If you order this product, plan to take it to your seamstress in order to have the seams which separate the pockets completed. The manufacturer should be ashamed to present this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: WONT STAY FLAT. THIN AND FLIMSY
customer_reviews.text: Not at all happy with this. While it has a lot of storage space, it won't stay flat and just rolls up. Regret my purchase; don't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Nice band but if u r a curvy girl it rolls up
customer_reviews.author: Nyla

customer_reviews.title: Not thick enough to support valuables
customer_reviews.text: Returned this item, fabric is far too flimsy to hold anything securely like your phone or keys to car or home (feels like underwear fabric). And it the size XL does not fit women's size 43 hips, it rides up to waist and folds over. Really wanted to like this item but it does not work the same as the photos show (the models are probably 16 years old and wear size 2).
customer_reviews.author: Think Again

customer_reviews.title: Good concept but my money fell out while traveling
customer_reviews.text: What I like about the belt is that it is comfortable and holds quite a bit. I would have rated it higher had I not leaned over once and all of my money fell out on the floor. Not cool! It would be much better if it had a zipper on all of the pouches. After the incident in which my money fell out, I went back to my standard money belt.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Hide Under Clothing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the ivory and the black Stashbandz for an international trip to carry my passport and cash. They fit perfectly and comfortably across my waist. Be aware that the ivory color will show what you place in the pockets. I ended up wearing the ivory under a loose top and pants so that what I carried was not visible to anybody. The black band was worn on top of my yoga pants under a loose top. I'm very pleased with the quality. I would purchase again, except the ivory.
customer_reviews.author: Ipo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My rear is large & so are my thighs... I usually have to go up a size to accommodate this. I followed the sizing & am pleased that I did not go up a size! Very happy with this product quality & fit. Looking forward to using it!
customer_reviews.author: MSquared

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it. Just went for 2 hours hike and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in black for trip to Europe. LOVE it. Just went for 2 hours hike and 1 hour church service with 2 passports, several credit cards, my reading glasses, a tube of chapstick, some cash and loose change - used bathroom, paid for stuff, took pictures....It is great. I'd attach a photo if I could because you can not tell I have all this junk around my waist. I am beyond pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rhondalikescoffee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit and convenient to use!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when I got this that the band would bunch or ride up creating an unwanted muffin top and generally making it a pain to use, but this has not been an issue through both cardio and weight training! This is great for my workouts at the gym, I keep my weight training routine on my phone, so I have to pull it out a lot while working out, and this is much easier than if it were in an armband on my arm (or tucked into my waistband which is what I was doing before). I'm 170 lbs and generally wear a size 10, and I ordered a medium which fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Refuses To Stay Put
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wear while jogging. It fits great and looks good immediately after putting it on, but within 2-3 steps it's already twisting around and riding up. I have to yank the darn thing back down to my hips and rotate it back so often that I'm ready to just chuck it. I gave it two stars because it is attractive and well made, and will probably work well for someone with no waist (Like a male or a woman without any hourglass shape to their waist at all.) For size reference: I ordered a small, I am 5'7", 128 lbs, athletic body with a slender waist. It fits perfectly until I move.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for walking our 120lb pit bull
customer_reviews.text: This is such a useful accessory . I had been searching for one that would fit my petite frame (for reference 5 ft, 90 lbs). I use it to store my phone and wallet in when I walk our 120 lb rescue pit. I really appreciate having both hands free. This is especially important when our pup spots a .... SQUIRREL! It’s also a perfect size and fit for running or other exercise. Truly well made and honestly , one Of the most practical purchases I’ve made in a long time (let’s just say our pit bull Has a lot of sparkly collars, much to my husband’s dismay)
customer_reviews.author: KShibata

customer_reviews.title: ... my trip to Italy bc I can't stand those stupid neck - passport holders
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in nude and I used this for my trip to Italy bc I can't stand those stupid neck - passport holders. My passport, phone, money, chapstick, and everything else fit perfectly in this. I like the zipper compartment, and I wish there more zippered areas. My only "complaint" is that this did nothing for my muffin top. But since I didn't buy it for that reason, I'm ok with it. I now use this for when I go on long walks.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Not as good a quality as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Not as good a quality as I thought it would be. Rode up on my hips up to my waist. Returned it
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Bell

customer_reviews.title: Could be better, more zippers and better quality material needed
customer_reviews.text: I just received this band and used it today for a trip to NYC. It fit as expected and was lightweight and stayed in place. I was disappointed that only one of the pockets on it had a zipper - it would be nice to have at least two zipper pockets if not all of them. My iPhone 8 Plus with otter box commuter case fit fine inside the band. However the material is so lightweight that as I went to take it off my finger went right through the material. So I used this once and it already has a whole in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kare

customer_reviews.title: Great for CCW!
customer_reviews.text: bought it for CCW. I carry a Ruger lcp 2 with extended mag. I did not want to pay 60-100 dollars for 'concealed carry running belts' from gun sites. tried a few 'large' running belts and none worked. took a chance on this one and boy am i glad i did. Pockets all the way around and huge! i was running the other day and almost turned around because i thought i forgot my gun...nope it was there just didn't feel it...great large pockets but fits close to body and no imprinting...great buy
customer_reviews.author: Keith Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Love this ! Best purchase I have ever made
customer_reviews.text: I love my new StashBandz and use it every day. I am a runner and have a 9 month old Australian Shepard puppy that I take out for a short jog/walk every morning. Before I was trying to hold a lease, my iPhone 7+, treats and her potty bag. Now I am hands free. Phone fits nicely with no bouncing , a seperate pocket for treats, another pocket for potty bag dispenser and one left open for keys or ID cards etc. Love this product and it stays in place too without riding up. I highly recommend this product . I wasn't too thrilled about having to pay for the extra shipping but I haven't regretted it even one day.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Wright

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use while inline skating but instead have tested it out with weight lifting and running so far. Does not stay in place while running!! Granted I am hip heavy and have a few lbs to lose it jumped all over the place no matter where I set it in my hips. I liked the top load pockets more than the Flip Belt mid loading style though. My items felt more secure. It did have a tendency to roll while lifting weights which I'd imagine would happen while out and about if you're bending frequently (I have a toddler so I do this a lot). I found the magnetic pouch works better for me than the belts.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Hesitant at first, but now I'm sold!
customer_reviews.text: I'm solo traveling for 10-months next year, and I wanted to find a way to protect my important documents. I looked into RFID neck bags (the neck string irritates my skin), sling bags with hidden pockets on the backside (unreliable), and even thought about putting some of my stuff in my sports bra (not sweat proof or comfortable). Each of these options made me feel anxious. Not with this one though. I tested it out and my skin didn't get irritated. The fabric is similar to that of yoga pants, but for your waist and important docs. It's pretty great. For reference, I'm 5'3 and weigh about 180 lbs. The large fit me perfect. Not too tight. Not too loose.
customer_reviews.author: B Quiroa

customer_reviews.title: Prefer over Flipbelt
customer_reviews.text: I had previously owned a flipbelt for running, and I was happy with it, but I got it when I had an iPhone 4S and it just wasn't compatible with my iPhone XR. I prefer this item because the material is thinner so it's not noticeable at all under clothing unless things are in it. I also like that it is easier to get things in and out while still keeping them secure, and it has one zipper pouch. I will say that if I put my phone in a non-zipper pouch upright, it feels like it is wiggling out slowly, so I always turn it sideways and it stays very securely while running.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but doesn't work as well as I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: Great idea... unfortunately it lacks structure so it tends to roll/fold while wearing, and it is difficult to find the pocket openings in a hurry. I think this could be resolved with some stiff stitching in some areas (sidewalls, openings to pockets). If only they could just put adequate pockets in exercise gear/women's clothing to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Very nice soft material, fit well and very comfortable. Unlike the fanny pack type travel money belt, it does not have that hard belt and/or bucket. Also unlike a fanny pack type travel money belt, it has pockets all the way around and not just in the front, 5 pockets in all. 4 pockets are the same size and large enough to fit a 7plus iPhone. The front pocket is a little smaller but it still fits my passport and it has a hidden zipper. Hopefully, it will wear and function as well as it appears. I travel soon so I will update my review when I return.
customer_reviews.author: A Standard above the rest

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny to skip theme park bag check.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this belt for my visit to several theme parks. It works great. It has three pockets and one zippered pocket. The pockets are large and can fit pretty much anything. On a daily basis, I carried a phone, ID, credit card, chapstick, pill case, small sunscreen bottle, and theme park passes. Occasionally, I'd have to put my sunglasses in there, as well as my husband's phone. I wore it on all kinds of rides, including roller coasters without anything falling out. This belt is worth every penny to not have to carry a bag around the park and go through the bag check line!
customer_reviews.author: _iCarrie_

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Awesome customer service. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t ask for a better product. So many uses for this band. This meets our needs for my 10 year old daughter who has sensory processing disorder. Because of this she is limited on clothing choices. Unfortunately her tactile friendly pant of choice lacks pockets. I ordered her an ivory band but received the wrong color and size. I called the company and they were quick to correct the mistake and then some. I was also told to keep the original band. I will share it with someone who can use it. I also received a nice handwritten note from the owner. I would definitely recommend this company and the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Feelings - Functional but not for everyday - at least not for me
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what it claims - but for me it was a bit uncomfortable to wear around the waist. This may just be a personal thing for me - but it felt overly bulky with street pants. For running in exercise shorts it might be just fine. I will keep it - since I found that it is much more comfortable worn around the chest - where I'll use it when traveling instead of the very obvious neck-wallet I have been using. So - it does what it says - but if you order one, try it out and see how comfortable it fits your body type.
customer_reviews.author: Gungo

customer_reviews.title: Terrific, just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to carry my passport and ID on an overseas trip and it is perfect! Lots of pockets to store cash, ID, hotel keys, etc. It is very comfortable, fits close to the body but breathable -- was in 95 degree heat for over a week and never felt it getting sweaty or gross. It is a bit expensive for what it is but no regrets. I purchased the teal one because it's a favorite color but it did show through some of my thinner shirts. If I had it to do over, I'd probably get the flesh colored one. In fact, if I come into extra spending $$ I might just splurge and get another!
customer_reviews.author: Cheestopher

customer_reviews.title: Great for Duopa pump!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a Cadd Duopa infusion pump 16 hours a day and the Stashbandz holds it perfectly. Much more comfortable than any of the options available through Duopa. The Stashbandz has additional pockets with room for i.d., credit cards and even a phone, but I prefer to house only the pump in the front pocket for easy access. I still carry a purse for other necessities. If I wear a loose fitting top, my Stashbandz completey conceals the pump! I have black and nude, but will definitely order more. Occasionally, I carry pump on the outside of my clothing in a fanny pack, but I much prefer the security and comfort provided by Stashbandz.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $20+
customer_reviews.text: It serves its purpose. Saving your stuff while you run/walk or exercise. I recently bought it to put my phone and car keys while I walk at the park. It doesn’t “jiggle” everywhere. BUT the band keeps folding all the way into a roll and it gets uncomfortable to wear. The only part that doesn’t fold is where my phone is. I must be unfolding it and fixing it frequently. Honestly I think I should of just gone for the old fashion hip purses. They’re cheaper and don’t fold. Other than that it’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: Linn622

customer_reviews.title: Comfort while carrying my chemo pump!
customer_reviews.text: I can't recommend this belt enough! I LOVE it! I carry a chemo pump for three days at a time and have to be careful of tubing and/or possibly dropping it off of my shoulder while carrying it. My pump is 9.5" x 4" x 2" but the pocket on the belt stretches enough to hold it. Some of my tubing fits into the other pocket. It makes a weird bump under my clothing but I don't even care, all of my tubing is under my clothing! I even sleep with it on! No more worries about my tubing getting caught on things or burned on the stove, etc! I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: greeneyes

customer_reviews.title: Great little concealed travel belt
customer_reviews.text: Traveled to Jamaica with this one and it worked great. I was able to have this completely concealed while walking around. Only reason I gave it a 4 instead of 5 is due to it being hard to get things out of the pouches which kind of breaks the concealment. It takes a while fidgeting with the pouches to get say a passport or some money out. Lastly, it's not practical to stick any larger sized phone inside the pouches due to the imprint and how hard it is to get things out. I also didn't find the back pouches quite as useful but I am going to keep it as it met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Does provide pockets, but....
customer_reviews.text: I do like the way this item fulfills its purpose and provide needed pockets. It is a little disappointing, however, that it does not have enough body to hold its shape. It scrunches up or down easily and can wind up in a narrow band around your body. It is easy to pull up or down to get it out of the way, but then might come back to place upside down or inside out, depending on how you pull it. A bit of a sturdier backing would have insured that it did not scrunch up or out and would stay in the right position to provide pockets. I have a 35" waist and the size medium fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Herrin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wearable replacement for bag or purse
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome for everyday use for phone, cards and even bulky ring of keys. I basically wear it all day since women’s clothing have little to no pockets. It looks like the bottom of a long undershirt, not like a fanny pack or anything weird. I wear it running, cycling, teaching and shopping. I never have to worry about forgetting my wallet in the other bag or purse. I have a toddler, so the less I have to carry in my hands the better. I am a 10-12, and the medium is great and doesn’t sag even with heavy keys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 22 and the xlarge fits great. Used on a trip to Morocco and never worried about my passport, money or credit cards because you can feel them right there, but you couldn't tell I had it on because my tops were always a bit loose, not form fitting. Great product. Wish I had thought of it.
customer_reviews.author: LOIS

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Security: Priceless
customer_reviews.text: I wore this every day for the past month while traveling overseas. It was comfortable and comforting, as I didn't want to leave any of my documents behind, i.e. passport, extra $$ and credit card, when sightseeing, etc. It doesn't add bulk, and I was relieved and happy that I had bought it. Airport travel tip: you can't wear it during x-ray screening, but you can slip it on afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: KMP

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for me while I run
customer_reviews.text: I just started up running again so I'm building up my mileage. I have found that I dislike tight anything on my body while running. This did pose a problem at first with how I'm going to carry my super large phone (Samsung galaxy s10+) comfortably while running until this little item. I bought the black medium and do not regret it. I barely feel it around my waist and hips as I run even with my phone in one of the pockets. I've also carried my keys too and no problem. It allows for quick, easy access if needed on the run. I highly recommend for anyone that needs an armband alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Watson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but does bunch up
customer_reviews.text: I do like the fact it fits around my waist, but when I put my cell phone in, it is uncomfortable, but still useable. I have not tried the pocket that zips for keys. I am wearing it all day today around the house, as it's easier to stick my phone in there, but you have to be careful that you phone is fully in the pocket because my phone did fall out once. Not sure if this helped anyone. I will keep it and try it for my vacation and see how I like it then.
customer_reviews.author: Donna from the desert

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Stays in Place, But Small for iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I loved how wide and flat this running belt seemed. When I received it, I was more than happy with the fit and lay of the belt when worn. It is almost unnoticeable, extremely comfortable, and easy to use. My only issue is that it does not, in fact, really fit my phone (iPhone 8 Plus). I had hoped, given the size of this belt, that it would hold the phone. Don't get me wrong - it will hold it - but it does stick out and I worry about it falling out when I run so I took a star off for that. As a walking belt, however, I feel pretty confident my items will stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Tonia

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an xl and a medium. The medium was too tight, so I returned it. I had called to check on sizes. The xl was so comfortable, but I wish I’d ordered an l. No time before we left for Ecuador though. The xl would wiggle up to my bra line. But zipping in passports and a credit card made them undetectable and this is a great product. Not sure how secure the unzippered pockets would be-also I wanted access to my phone camera so I didn’t use it for my phone or outside my clothes. Looking forward to using it when I need a pocket at home. WHY DON’T THEY PUT POCKETS ON ALL WOMENS CLOTHING?????
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and I am a big fan. The only reason it gets a 4.5 instead of 5 stars is because it moves around a bit... The actual fit is fine (I ordered a small after reading many reviews) because you want it fitted, but because of the actual size of it it goes from your natural waist to your hips and for me, that means that it sort of moves around a bit depending on what I'm wearing (90% of the time yoga pants). It wants to kind of creep up and I don't have big hips to keep it in place I suppose? But other than that it's perfect/exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Conundrum

customer_reviews.title: This thing is so cool!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the coolest! I use it a lot when hiking or exercising and don’t have leggings with pockets. The size of the pockets fit surprisingly a lot of things. I can put my keys, headphones and phone in them with no problem. It’s sleek and fits perfectly around my waist and easy to put on and remove. Only complaint is sometimes it can be a little hard to find where the pockets are, but it’s not a big deal. Definitely worth the money and I’ve thought about getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: One of the best fitness purchases I've made
customer_reviews.text: I'm on the plus-size side of things so I got an XL, I have not the faintest idea what my pant size is but I wear XL workout bottoms from Old Navy. It fits perfectly- snug around my belly and hips, with a ton of storage room. I've worn it for outdoor walks, on the treadmill and elliptical at the gym, and during intense weightlifting. It has not curled up or slid around once, and I literally don't even notice it once it's on, even when it's loaded with my phone, keys, gum, mask, etc.
customer_reviews.author: TNcat79

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Using for over a year now and love the soft feel, durability, versatility and wash ability of the product. Usually keep stuff I. The 6 pockets and have to step into it to put on, not a bad trade off given how comfortable it is. Just ordered the newer model with a zippered back pocket in another color for backup and wardrobe flexibility. Really like the fit and flattering content controlled just below the waste bulge. A favorite piece for just being out and about, not just exercising.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy Felder

customer_reviews.title: I've purchased twice and will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I've been very happy with this product. I have one from a few years ago that still hold ups and I bought this to have a spare. I will say that if you only have your phone in it it does tend to ride up. You kind of have to balance it out. But when working out (running, biking, hiking, etc) it hold everything well and does not bounce around. Love that there is a zipper pocket also. I've even used this for carrying money / cards while on vacation and loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff & Jon

customer_reviews.title: Good for jogging or sightseeing.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work. I have a busy job that has me on the move. I hoped this would hold my phone, chapstick, etc. I hoped it would also keep my midriff covered as I reached and bent. It is a nice belt, with 4 large pockets, one zippered. It was easy to put on, and comfortable to wear. However, with all my movement, it rolled and turned around. So, it didn't meet my hopes there, but I plan to take it with me on vacation, do I can use it sightseeing, hiking, etc.
customer_reviews.author: So Fab Blue

customer_reviews.title: I would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Nothing is perfect so i will tell you my one thing that I think could be adjusted. when I'm running it's a little difficult finding the projects (they blend in so good) and I think the zipper handle could be a little bigger. It was challenging to grasp the front zipper mid stride. My fix to this is just leave it open. Honestly my S7 phone, Keys and remote my dogs E-collar all fits perfect and secure, No bounce at all!! I'd have to be upside down on my head for anything to come out, even then though I bet my things would stay in. Perfect simple idea, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Krystle Shumski

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient, super secure
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my trip abroad~ it worked perfectly. It fit my passport and cell phone easily. One of the four pockets has a zipper for extra peace of mind. Now that the honeymoon is over, I use this thing all of the time when I walk my dog. Now I carry my cell phone, poop bag, and milkbones. It's still perfect. When you order, keep in mind that it's UNISEX sizes. The models of course are female (with perfectly flat tummies lol). Dummy me, I went with the large thinking it would be a women's large. It's a little larger than it should be, so I stitched it a smaller. It still rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Longo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Subtle
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a trip to Greece. This was one of the best purchases I made for my trip. This is very convenient for carrying basic items, and it is pretty subtle. I mostly wore it over my lightweight exercise pants, but it was very uncomfortable to wear over a pair of jeans. Nevertheless, it's a five star item for travel! I wear a size 10 women's jeans (I have hips/a larger butt) and had to return the medium to get a size large. A medium was a little tight around my stomach/above the hips. The size large sat comfortably across my hips, so consider a size up if you like a fit like this.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Diamante

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My sister first introduced me to this and after wearing it I had to buy one for myself. We wore them to a baseball game where neither of us were wearing pants with pockets. This held my keys, money, credit card and cell phone and left my hands free to catch a fly ball. It's great not having to worry to carry a purse in and out of the stadium. I have also used it while walking on the beach. It's so comfortable you don't even realize you have it on even when things are in the pockets. I collected a bunch of shells and had them in the back pocket and completely forgot they were there. Definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for keeping your phone in place!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this to go out salsa dancing (so I don't have to bring a purse and risk having it stolen), and I've been putting my iPhone 6s Plus in there, and it's worked so well!! The phone stays in place no problem. I'm surprised that having this on while dancing doesn't make this whole thing sweaty, but the material must help with that or something, because it never feels sweaty for me and my phone stays perfectly dry. Awesome, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Fits snug but comfortable material!
customer_reviews.text: This band is great! Has 3 pockets that fold over to secure itens and one that has a zipper. Good quality material. I ordered a Medium based on other reviews (I usually wear a womens size 10) and it fits snug but comfortable. I would sugest maybe ordering a size up if you want a more loose fitting band or if you are traveling summer months as it may get warm being snug. Very happy with this puchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Ferrara

customer_reviews.title: I use this all the time going to the gym
customer_reviews.text: This is the best gym hack ever for bringing my phone, earbuds and keys with me to the gym. I never worry about leaving my stuff behind at the machines because it's all with me in these super secret pockets. Definitely recommend wearing over a fitted tank top as it looks the most stylish this way. Also, putting things in the pockets understandably changes the silhouette of the running belt, which looks chunky and terrible if you are wearing a shirt over it. It looks a lot better being worn on top.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Choo

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to see if it would help stabilize my SI joint. I bought the wrong size so exchanged it and got a size after advice through a call directly to the manufacturer. While it has not helped with my joint so far, it is comfortable way to keep hands free from having to carry the usual things needed when out of the house for running, traveling, etc. I cannot day enough about the woman I spoke with at Stashbandz (Kathryn). If you are looking for a quality product backed by excellent customer service, this is the place!
customer_reviews.author: IMA

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea but needs design needs rework
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this but its not quite right. I bought medium and large both had the same issues. I sent the medium back too tight. I am a size 12 pants. It does not stay in place. If you sit it shifts up or rolls It needs a toggle with elastic to costume fit it in place. It does fit my phone and is quite comfortable when it stays in place. Maybe one with a belt would be a better fit. I will keep since I have been wearing it but will be on the lookout for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: L. Silverman

customer_reviews.title: No extra bulk, light weight, secure!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mostly for a trip to Kings Island, but found it perfect for long walks with my fur babies. Holds loads of stuff without adding a lot of unnecessary bulk to my waist. My daughter liked it so much,, she immediately purchased her own. I bought an extra large. According to the size chart I could have gone either way. They warn that going to small can cause rolling. I wish I would have gone with the large. The xl hangs down a little when I have my phone and keys in it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Not good for running
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for running and unfortunately it doesn't stay where it is supposed to.I used it for a few weeks and more times then not it becomes a sweaty rolled up mess. I would never put my phone or money in this for anything longer then a light walk.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: This fits great!
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 14 and got a Large in this band and it fits very well. It wasn't even that difficult to get on. I am very pale and got the light taupe color and you can't see it through a white shirt on me. I couldn't even find the zipper compartment for a few minutes. The whole thing seems very well-made and it's very comfortable to wear. It also compresses my lower stomach a bit, providing a slimming effect. I am looking forward to using this on my upcoming vacation!
customer_reviews.author: Heather C

customer_reviews.title: Stitching is coming apart ..
customer_reviews.text: amazing concept but the stitching is already coming apart. Use it for exercising... just shocked because product has great reviews but this doesn’t match to what was written. My boyfriend has one from another brand and I wish I would’ve bought that one instead because his stitching has come apart. Disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic money belt alternative!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a money belt alternative for a week in Rome and it was fantastic for my needs. The xsmall fit snugly but not uncomfortably so. I felt secure knowing my passport was safe in the zip pocket (there is only one pocket area that zips but I found this to be adequate) I only held my passport, cash and credit cards in this. You would be able to slide a phone in as well. I wore it so that the waistband of my pants pulled over it. With a shirt untucked you couldn’t tell it was there at all. I’m sure this would be great for runners as well. Extremely satisfied customer! Grazie!
customer_reviews.author: julesj66

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, useful and attractive - can’t beat that!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Fits so well that it is completely hidden under my clothes for travel yet easily holds documents and money for safekeeping. Is comfortable and lightweight and definitely durable. My only issue is that it can ride up a bit if walking, running or exercising which I think is due to my body type (wide hips, smaller waist) since ideally I would like to wear it a bit over my hips. A great product!!
customer_reviews.author: amazinglyme

customer_reviews.title: Gave it a try.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this. I bought for a trip to South America. Bought a large. I tried for a few hours. It was way loose. I feel it ran big. On top of that it ended up rolling up. Maybe it’s made for someone with solid abs. So it stays put. I ain’t got them. I’m just curvy. Who knows. I wish it’d of been longer. More spandex in it. Tighter fit. The concept is great but maybe a few alterations. So I just hid my money the old fashion way. You ladies know.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Pasillas

customer_reviews.title: Might work for you if you look like the model in the photo?
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I think I am too fat and lumpy for this to work. (LOL) I bought this for a trip to Italy this summer. Trying it out when it arrived, no matter how we arranged it, 1- it was obvious that I was carrying a phone under my clothing, and 2 - it kept rolling down and shifting. Plus it seemed like a hassle when we had to get to our valuables like the phone or credit card. I just went with an anti-theft purse instead.
customer_reviews.author: A. Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Not very effective
customer_reviews.text: Keeps riding up in any place where you do not have something in it. Too tight, even for the large size and wants to slide to the narrowest part of your body. As shown on the model it would not stay there if active such as running or working, especially when bending over. I even tried using it around my rib cage under my shirt but while it would stay there, it would not stay flat.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabethe of Lehi

customer_reviews.title: Slid to natural waist
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for traveling. Functionally, this held what I needed however it tended to slide to my natural waist over the day, which is narrower than my hips, so I was a bit afraid of my passport coming out. It did not, and probably wouldn’t, but I was a bit uneasy.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory to your workout!
customer_reviews.text: I like it! Ok I am not sure on how durable it is but so far so good with lots of pockets to stash little things in . I have the iPhone 11 with an otter box defender and it does tightly fit in the zippered compartment. For the price I believe that this is worth it I am just hoping that it will hold up a while. I ordered the size small and I wear a 2-4 in pants or a small in gym clothes. Hope this helps !
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Best product ever. I run about 4 times a week and go to the gym on the off days. This allows me to put my cell phone and key on without even feeling it. It also allows me to lift weights without a cumbersome arm band or having to carry it around. It’s so awesome I bought each of my family members one. I also travel a lot. I put my passport and cash in it. With multiple pockets, it allows me to keep thinks separate.
customer_reviews.author: Mia S

customer_reviews.title: Quite difficult to deal with
customer_reviews.text: I got the Small size which I think is right for me. However, it easily bunches up (folds). If I don't use the flap to hold my Moto Z4 phone in (horizontally, not vertically), it would fall out. withing 1 minute. Claiming that you could put your cellphone vertically in the pocket is...bogus! Overall, it's just a bad design. it needs some built-in rigidity to make it usable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Degani

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I use the belt at overseas under my clothes. My passport and ID's were secure. I did not notice that I have it on most of the time. It is smooth to the skin and does not make you sweat around the mid area. It is comfortable. It is not bulky. I wash it at the washer machine all the time and do not loose it form. It is the best way to keep your documents safe on your body.
customer_reviews.author: Andromeda

customer_reviews.title: difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: This is an elastic band that pretty much goes where you don't want it to go. Once you put something in the pockets, you'll have a hard time getting it out. I am using it for an insulin pump. Trying to get it out when an alarm sounds is pretty much impossible. I'm just wearing my pump attached to the outside of this band. Not real sure I can recommend this for anything practical.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Brummett

customer_reviews.title: Nice Money Belt
customer_reviews.text: I like this because it is a good way to keep money on my person. Nice zipper size pocket for cash. I don't think it would be comfortable to put my iPhone in the other slip pockets but that's me. I also ordered a small and it just makes it so that it is comfortable on my hips. I only weigh 115 pounds. If I gain the 10 pounds that I want to gain, I will have to wear this on my waist. I wish I had ordered the medium or large. But I need this in one week so I will keep it. Not enough stretch to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits everything!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to bring along my diabetic supplies on walks with my daughter! It fits all the things I need: my phone, snacks, keys and so much more! The band is super comfortable and barely noticeable when you are wearing it. I’m thinking of buying another for my mom who is also diabetic as a way that she can carry snacks when she’s on the go! Such an amazing product!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Comstock

customer_reviews.title: awesome product! I was hesitant because it wasn't an ...
customer_reviews.text: awesome product! I was hesitant because it wasn't an amazon priime (free ship) and it's cost was a bit more than others. Believe me, it is totally worth it! I forget I am wearing it and it has plenty of room for everything! Even my Samsung Note 5! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't seen much use yet
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife for use during our Switzerland trip. Since we had a native with us the whole time and we stayed at her house we ended up not finding a use for it. I suggested she keep it for future trips and for things like holding her cell phone since she typically tucks it in her waistband. She did comment that it was tighter on her than she was used to but she felt she could get used to it in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Frazee

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! They never make women's clothing with enough pockets. This is so comfortable to wear and so roomy. It is not at all bulky and lays totally flat except for the items you place in it. I am using it when I exercise, but I also like that it can also be worn under your clothing for a safe place to carry items when traveling. I am so glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: neatnik

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place, no ride up
customer_reviews.text: This belt is awesome. I run distance and track. It's obviously more comfortable at slower speeds, but it DID hold my giant Samsung Galaxy 9 in the front pocket with Strava on while I was doing mile sprints on track. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great if you want to keep your phone within easy access without pockets in your clothes
customer_reviews.text: I have found this money belt to be very useful. I use it whenever I'm hiking and want to have my phone on me to quickly access as a camera. It was a pain to always have to stop and dig it out of my backpack. This way, it doesn't matter what shorts I'm wearing and what kind of pockets the shorts have because I've got a guaranteed phone pocket. It fits my iPhone 7 plus although the phone kind of sticks out, so I have to wear a somewhat baggy shirt. But I don't wear form-hugging shirts anyway, so no problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Form fitting functional money belt
customer_reviews.text: This product lived up to the expectations. The elastic and material are comfortable enough that you barely even know you are wearing it. It has plenty of space to fit your wallet and passport and other items. Sitting down, my passport tends to push against my side which was uncomfortable. I like that one of the 4 sections has a zipper which works well. If you wear tight fitting clothes and pack the money belt, it will be obvious you are wearing something underneath. Otherwise, it’s quite discreet. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L.

customer_reviews.title: Rolls up when moving around
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this belt for when I don't have pockets on an outfit and jogging. I thought it would be great for a layered look. It ran a bit small. I'm on the curvy side too, and the fabric rolls up when I move around in my daily life, which made it uncomfortable to wear. Also if worn under other clothes, plan to leave your items there. Not a good place for your payment methods if you're out shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Great item. Not sure how flattering it is
customer_reviews.text: I used this heavily when I went to Jamacia. It was a bit warm to have on but not annoyingly so and with that said it didn't get all sweat-nasty. Pretty much holds anything the Batman's Belt can hold... even my beer when I had to use two hands. It's got a nice secure zipper pocket and the open pockets around it's circumference were easy to access. It was nice not to deal with a wallet or more bulky options. cannot see it under your shirt even with phones and crap in it. Not really flattering...I mean it's a money belt.
customer_reviews.author: ovrlnd

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sleek.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for traveling. They worked well and are completely unnoticeable under clothing. (Might not be true for very tight clothing). It's great that they have pockets all around, and can be positioned however you like. Highly recommend. Like that they will also be useful for summer exercising. Just haven't tried that yet, so didn't rate them for working out. Also would provide a sleek alternative to anyone who likes a fanny pack :)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend but might be ok for some
customer_reviews.text: Bunches up, rides up, and really looks weird with your phone and passport in it. Like you can see it under your clothes and it’s super obvious. You would have to wear really baggy clothes to make it less obvious.. but that could work. Just depends what you’re looking for. Didn’t work for me but I like the concept and it could work for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: interesting way to carry stuff with you.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for traveling. It is a interesting way to bring your phone / wallet with you. Obviously it can't be super thick otherwise it will stick out like a sore thumb. But I was going to colder places so I had a jacket which was able to hide the bulges. It is quite nice to have the important stuff close to your body. Only one zippered pocket. Also it's a bit tight to get it over your butt so it fits on your waist too - but I think that's part of the design.
customer_reviews.author: DocReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother with this.
customer_reviews.text: Way way way too tiny! Maybe a child would wear an adult medium or large. Kind of hot. I wouldn’t bother. Now that they are making leggings with cell phone pockets, I will just use those instead of being strangled by this sweaty thing. I was not home for awhile when this packaged arrived and I missed the window to return it. I wish I did. It’s pretty expensive for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth E.

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. I used it all the time during my recent travels to Asia and it’s the best thing I’ve ever own during travels, I wished I had known about this before. It’s so convenient, it’s big enough to fit my passport, credit cards, and cellphone. I placed it under my shirt around my hips and it doesn’t look bulky. I also used it around my waist when I used a dress. I felt secure having my important things around my body and not in my purse. It’s also great for workout.
customer_reviews.author: Leiya

customer_reviews.title: Great for Theme Parks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this belt so I wouldn't have to bring a purse/bag into Universal Studios (where they require bags to be left in lockers on some rides). I am 5'2" 110 lbs and a small fit perfectly. My phone, keys, and other small items fit comfortably in the front pouch and all other items (mini sunblock, lipstick, hand sanitizer, etc.) fit in the other pockets. The belt was not visible at all under my t-shirt even when full. It stayed in place all day and was comfortable to wear. I will probably purchase a 2nd color to wear over my yoga pants.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S.

customer_reviews.title: Stashbandz Unisex Travel Money Belt
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I finally had a chance to wear this excellent travel money belt and I cannot tell you enough how absolutely wonderful and comfortable this belt was ! Soooo much more comfortable to wear than the belts that have a hard/cloth belt which has a snapping clip with adjustable belt straps. I have those kind too, but this soft pull-on fabric with the pockets was incredibly comfortable when wearing it for a long 10 hour day and I hardly even remembered I was wearing it (with keys, small wallet, etc.). Highly recommend it ! Thank you :)
customer_reviews.author: Lundsy

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it highly!
customer_reviews.text: This waistband is great, I like to listen to music while roaming around the house. I can just put my phone in there and never worry about dropping it. Also nice to just know where my phone is all the time. Because I’m always looking for it. I also take it to Clubs, Restaurant, and bars, it keeps me from having to keep track of a purse. Especially if you’re on the dance floor! It’s very inconspicuous when you wear a loose top. It has a flap that keeps everything secure. I recommend it highly!
customer_reviews.author: joney

customer_reviews.title: Finally one that doesn’t slide up too much
customer_reviews.text: The biggest problem I have with these are that they slide up when I run. This works pretty well, best I’ve ever had at least. Multiple pockets and one with a zipper. Got an XS, hips are about 36 in
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: The size XS works well for ladies up to size 26" waist, which is a bit different than what the size chart states. The rear pocket fits my huge Samsung S9+ (I have mixed feelings about having a huge smartphone in the first place) and the phone can rest easily on my lumbar in the rear pouch. I'm pleased that the front pouch features a zipper for important things like cards and a car key. I'm excited to use this both trail running and to discretely carry valuable while traveling abroad as a solo female! Woohoo!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hands free feels so good! No buckle! Safe and secure
customer_reviews.text: Hel a lot and very easily concealed even my big iphone in a case! Was great at amusement park and gave me security of knowing money and cards were zipped in! Liked the easy access pockets too as the zip pockets can ve a little hard to find. I am pant size 10. Bought Medium and was great! Not hot. And had a little slimming effect— not a lot but help is help! Everyone in group wanted one. Will use in Europe this fall and will be great at airport!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Nelsen

customer_reviews.title: High-quality stretchy bellyband to stash everything from your phone, to your lip balm, ID, and keys.
customer_reviews.text: This was made in the USA which was one of the reasons I purchased it. It has two zippered pockets and other pockets that are not zippered. It is sown with quality. I use it to stash my stuff when I’m running. This would be great for travel as it would hold your passport, and your cash under your shirt to avoid pickpockets. It will hold a large smart phone, but don’t expect it to hold something heavy like a pistol.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. B.

customer_reviews.title: Stashbandz Unisex
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's comfortable though it does try to squish all up into my waist, which is mainly if I wear it when working out, and then it's not comfortable when my phone stored in there is jabbing me in the waist. It's good if you wear it just to be hands free when out and about; but if you wear it underneath a top and then need to get something out of it, that's sort of a problem if people are around. I'm sorry I spent money on it.
customer_reviews.author: Reader916

customer_reviews.title: Not sweat proof
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I got this product it went to immediately went to use! I orders a size small because my pants size is a 5. It’s really comfortable, it fits perfect. I could if my iPhone in it, my keys and a gym towels in it. It felt like nothing when I was running. I think you could use this when you’re lifting weights just so your small items aren’t laying around but if you’re planning to get your cardio or high sweat on, it’s not the best. My keys and phone got sweat on them 😖 but other than that it works okay
customer_reviews.author: KC

product_meta.title: Stashbandz Sports Running Belt Waist Pack, Travel Money Bag Fanny Pack Workout, 3 Large Security Pockets Plus 1 Zippered Pocket Pouch Fits Phones and More, Extra Wide Spandex, USA Made
feature_bullets: SECURED 4 WIDE POCKETS. NEW CONCEALED ZIPPER POCKET ALL COLORS. Pockets load from the top with pickpocket proof fold over locking flap to secure items. StashBandz Unisex Workout - Travel Belt Fits iPhones and any size cell phone vertical or horizontal passport holder ID money keys flask holder glasses travel wallet insulin pump holder and more.
MADE IN AMERICA TOP QUALITY. All-in-one fashion sporting and travel accessory. A fanny pack insulin pump belt running waist pack and money belt for safe travel. See far left photo for best size.

DOUBLE THE WIDTH of other running or sport waist packs. Tubular stretch Spandex hip belt 6 inches high with four 8 inch wide pockets. Vertical stretch 7 inches high to accommodate all X-large cell phones and smartphones in your belt bag. Has one hidden zipper pouch.

HIGHEST QUALITY FABRIC soft but durable. Moisture wicking soaks up sweat keeps the body cool phones bacteria free. Stays put for runners with no chafing or bouncing. Non-bulky slimming comfort hides a muffin top. Discreet small logo.

100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. We design our own products and manufacture with a family owned facility in the USA.   We are the only authorized seller of this Patented, Trademarked product.  All images are protected by Copyrights.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
